feed.title: MSFS Blog
feed.subtitle: Development updates of Microsoft Flight Simulator.

entry.title: 40th Anniversary Stream Schedule
entry.summary: Next week we will be hosting several Anniversary streams! Each stream will take place at 2000Z / 12PM PST, with the exception of our Dev Q&A which will be at 1830Z.

entry.title: America’s First Black Astronauts
entry.summary: During the Cold War space race of the 1960s, there were three truths about American astronauts: Every astronaut was a major celebrity, mobbed by the media and an adoring public alike wherever they went. Every astronaut was recruited to the space program exclusively from the ranks of military test pilots. Every astronaut was a white … Continued

entry.title: Local Legend VIII: DHC-4 Caribou
entry.summary: One of the most capable aircraft for austere and bush flying, the DHC-4 Caribou, is the eighth in the Local Legend Series.

entry.title: March 2nd, 2023 Development Update
entry.summary: Over the last week, we released World Update 12: New Zealand, Local Legend VIII: De Havilland Canada DHC-4 Caribou, and Famous Flyer IV: Antonov An-225 Mriya. We are thrilled with the community’s reaction to all three releases, and the team is carefully monitoring your feedback and bug reports.

entry.title: Impulse Simulations Sale
entry.summary: For seven days starting on March 3rd save up to 33% on the following items: Emergency Response Pack – Oceania King Air Landmarks Cairns Oceania Liveries Pack A320 YBDG Bendigo Airport YCFS Coffs Harbour Airport YPAD Adelaide Airport YSBK Bankstown Airport To purchase these discounted items, visit the Microsoft Flight Simulator Marketplace, select ‘Featured’, scroll … Continued

entry.title: March 9th, 2023 Development Update
entry.summary: Public testing for Sim Update 12 continues with a new pre-release beta build (1.31.21.0) available today. You can see the change log for this version on our forums

entry.title: March 16th, 2023 Development Update
entry.summary: Screenshot by KotetuP (Twitter)Scrolling through the Development Update blog post today you’ll see a new section to our weekly Marketplace Update: The Marketplace Backlog. This section contains information about the number of products that have been submitted by Third Party Developers for Marketplace approval. entry.title: MSK Productions Sale
entry.summary: Enjoy discounted pricing on Marketplace content from MSK Productions.
